channel.title: Click = command, Reward For Help
channel.description:
Lately been trying to do that when you click a sendQuest in the music tab the command would happen.
Ex: [code]sendQuest("Giant Lobster (level 45)", 11134); // npc = 1693 if(summonLevel >= 0) sendQuest("@whi@::food", 4291); // npc = 1241 else [/code]
In the music tab you click it and the command what it says would happen.
Rep 4 reward pl0xz0r. (Talk About Rep, Cannot ask for it)

item.title: Click = command, Reward For Help
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

Lately been trying to do that when you click a sendQuest in the music tab the command would happen.

Ex:

sendQuest("Giant Lobster (level 45)", 11134); // npc = 1693 if(summonLevel >= 0) sendQuest("@whi@::food", 4291); // npc = 1241 else

In the music tab you click it and the command what it says would happen.

Rep 4 reward pl0xz0r. (Talk About Rep, Cannot ask for it)
